description: SeatGeek Platform API provides access to events, venues, and performers data for concerts, sports, theater, and other live entertainment

capabilities.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_EVENT_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive details about a specific event including venue, performers, date/time, and ticket information.

capabilities.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_EVENT_RECOMMENDATIONS
capabilities.description: Get personalized event recommendations based on your favorite performers, events, or location. Discover new events you might enjoy.

capabilities.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_EVENT_SEATING
capabilities.description: Get detailed section and row information for an event to understand the venue layout and available seating options. Useful for choosing the best seats.

capabilities.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_PERFORMER_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific performer including images, scores, and related metadata.

capabilities.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_PERFORMER_RECOMMENDATIONS
capabilities.description: Get recommendations for similar performers based on your interests. Discover new artists, bands, teams, or entertainers you might enjoy.

capabilities.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_TAXONOMIES
capabilities.description: Get a list of all available event categories and types (taxonomies) used on SeatGeek. Useful for understanding event classification and filtering options.

capabilities.name: SEAT_GEEK_GET_VENUE_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific venue including location, address, and other metadata.

capabilities.name: SEAT_GEEK_SEARCH_EVENTS
capabilities.description: Search for events on SeatGeek by performers, venues, dates, or general queries. Find concerts, sports games, theater shows, and other live entertainment.

capabilities.name: SEAT_GEEK_SEARCH_PERFORMERS
capabilities.description: Search for performers including artists, bands, sports teams, comedians, and more. Find your favorite entertainers and see their upcoming events.

capabilities.name: SEAT_GEEK_SEARCH_VENUES
capabilities.description: Search for venues by location, name, or other criteria. Find stadiums, theaters, concert halls, and other entertainment venues.
